title: Cambridge United 1-2 Leeds United - BBC News
summary: all the action from cambridge united v leeds .
cambridge united have scored nine goals in the fa cup so far this season ; only afc wimbledon ( 11 ) scored more in the opening two rounds .
uche ikpeazu with the first after meeting a rebound from a cambridge free kick , before either dallas or antonsson level in the second half .
mowatt meets jansson 's flick-on from a corner to give leeds the lead .

documents.title: goodnight ! cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: thanks for joining us on the live blog tonight - leeds were below par in the first half and run ragged by an efficient cambridge side , but did what they 've done scores of times this season and saved their skin with their second half offering .
we 'll be back on friday when derby visit elland road - until then , enjoy the rest of your week .

documents.title: garry monk on centre half issuescambridge 1-2 leeds
text: i 'm disappointed with pontus jansson 's booking , as i thought the ref got that wrong - pontus has no idea the player is there and tries to give himself leverage to get off .
cooper 's injury is an impact injury that 's inflamed the top of the knee , but we 're hoping it will settle in the next 24 hours and that he will be ok for friday .

documents.title: garry monk : young group always learningcambridge 1-2 leeds
text: getting through was the aim and i 'm really happy for those players .
we have a young group and what they have about them is that they reset and go again after setbacks , try and learn and put it right .
more often than not , they do that , in games and when we reflect on them .
we were causing our own problems a little , trying to play out football but inviting pressure .
it was n't the right pitch to do that on and we talked about moving it higher up the pitch , playing our football in their half .
i felt the team were trying to do the right things but i just felt they needed to play higher up - make the first pass a long one if you need to .
we 're very good at lasting games and they had their moments , but we saw that out .

documents.title: first half right up there from cambridgecambridge 1-2 leeds
text: maybe derry is underestimating what his players have achieved - that first half was right up there in a spring of good performances .
but as a manager , he has to be harsh - as soon as you start accepting defeat , against anyone , you 're on a slippery slope .
author: Mark Johnson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: shaun derry : i 'm guttedcambridge 1-2 leeds
text: i 'm full of disappointment - we can leave with our heads held high in many respects , but i 'm gutted with the manner we conceded the goals .
i never felt leeds broke us down in terms of fluidity and play - they had a lot of the ball second half , but we talked about that during the week .
for our first half performance , i 'm gutted we did n't come in at 2-0 .
we executed our game plan , but never in our game plan was defending the goals that we conceded .
we 're going to try and build upon that first half display and take it into the league - we want to stay in and around the top seven and must make sure this is a positive to build into saturday .
leeds hold a stature and i told my players to express themselves .
they did that .
i thought we had moments in the first half where a cutting edge would have allowed us to get a second goal , but you always know higher league opponents have a little switch they can turn on .
there was too much space on the pitch for their goals .

documents.title: cambridge come so fardoug shulman , bbc radio cambridgeshire
text: you look at cambridge five years ago - they were knocking around in the conference .
those were dark days .
they 're playing games like this now , and people want to come and watch them , want to come and play for them .
i wonder if shaun derry made a conscious effort to keep cambridge away from the draw , to shut themselves off from it .
it would have been a winnable game in the next round but they can be proud of their performance tonight .

documents.title: noel 's verdict on grimes and antonssoncambridge 1-2 leeds
text: silvestri flapped a little tonight , did n't command his area as well as we know he can - he did n't deal with things properly and did n't get his hands around stuff as he usually does .
old habits crept back in .
he was n't the only one not at the races , though .
i thought grimes did better , mind - he has more aggression and quality about him now and tried to make things happen .
that was a plus for him .
but i still do n't think anyone has really made a case to start in the league .
antonsson did n't have as much service as he needed in the first half - he had more people running off him and about him in the second , but the balls were aimless before that .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: mowatt impressivecambridge 1-2 leeds
text: mowatt made some clever runs in difficult conditions and got a great shot off to test the keeper - he had a lot more pace and energy about him , and his ball for the equaliser was lovely .
he 's shown monk that he 's still here and still fighting .
does he need to consider a move ?
well , this evening will have shown the manager that he can be the next man in the number ten role if roofe goes out wide when doukara is n't up to scratch .
he 's at a fantastic club but has to contribute .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time management keycambridge 1-2 leeds
text: garry monk might try a system - but if it 's not working , the players should recognise that and make those changes themselves , be less sloppy .
cambridge were fantastic , squeezing a leeds side that expected to have loads of time on the ball - but there was no way the home side could have kept that intensity up .
it 's strange , how leeds always play so much better in the second half .
it 's interesting , and it shows monk has a calm manner , an intelligence about him .
he can get his ideas across but the team have to put that into practice , which they did .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: leeds showed their classdoug shulman , bbc radio cambridgshire
text: i could n't believe what i was watching in the first half , how well cambridge pressed and how many second balls they won .
but leeds , credit to them , did show their class , and they probably would have had a telling off from monk at half time .
cambridge really did take leeds apart , and monk probably would have ordered them to play a higher line and force cambridge into errors .

documents.title: cambridge start no surprisecambridge 1-2 leeds
text: that intensity in the second half - leeds were a different animal and piled the pressure on .
there was intensity , quality of passing and purpose .
but the players should n't have been shocked by what cambridge did - this was their chance to create an upset and leeds had to respond to that .
cambridge could have had more than one .
leeds were far less negative in the second half and got men into the right positions when it counted .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: breakingfull time : cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: stay with us for all the reaction .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: ball breaking to ikpeazu again and again - and now it 's the last chance for cambridge and everybody goes up onto the edge of the leeds penalty area as the hosts win a corner .
jansson belts it away full time now , surely .
it 's like a comfort blanket when bartley is near the ball - the keeper belts it forward and he 's there again and again .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: mowatt and dallas keep it in the corner and try to run down the clock , but dallas is accused of leaning into his man and it 's a cambridge free kick .
the ball goes long and jansson collects , sending it to roofe .
roofe shoots from distance but it loops wide - mowatt was in the middle .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: head tennis as ikpeazu breaks down the right , but jansson thwarts him and squirrels it away to denton .
leeds break and dallas and roofe work well to win a corner .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: ikpeazu moves back inside and gets the shot away , but it fires into the top of the stand .
scary stuff for the visitors moments after bartley saved their bacon .

documents.title: breakingfour added minutescambridge 1-2 leeds
text: breakingfour added minutescambridge 1-2 leeds

documents.title: breakingcambridge sub : williams off , clark on
text: mingoia angles a shot away .
the ball bounces to silvestri and the leeds keeper palms it forward but leeds scramble it clear before the ball can get to williams .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: lewie coyle is fouled on halfway and bartley applauds him for winning his individual battle - and that 's what leeds have needed .
they 've been more positive , winning second balls and challenges .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: attendance tonight is 7,973 , 1,400 from leeds .
coyle heads away from dunne 's effort and twists as he heads the ball - the leeds man has gone down here but is getting to his feet , stretching his knee .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: jansson knocks ikpeazu to the floor but it 's clearly no foul - he just ran into the back of jansson and flops down too easily .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: mingoia delivers the free kick but denton hashes the clearance to gift the hosts a corner .
the ball goes towards ikpeazu and skims the top of his head - roberts is running in behind but can not convert .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: roofe has done so well for the hosts - they 've fed the ball to him with increasing regularity .
roofe feeds it to phillips , who shoots before the ball hits the defender 's hand - but it 's not deliberate .
ikpeazu up silvestri 's clearance and looks to go round jansson , but jansson belts it clear .
berry forces a foul from mowatt and they have a free kick 15 yards from the area .
author: Mark Johnson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: good cambridge harrying ensures the free kick comes to nothing but leeds nonetheless look in control , winning a throw down the right .
roofe does well to turn out of trouble and links up well with grimes , looking for dallas down the line .
phillips arrives at pace but adams blocks him off .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: ikpeazu breaks down the right and jansson comes across to hand the hosts a throw .
taylor finds ikpeazu , who holds off his man and is forced to turn - taylor loops the ball in but ikpeazu is stifled , leeds winning a free kick for a heavy challenge on denton .

documents.title: cambridge 1-2 leeds
text: leeds have upped the tempo second half and are doing so well at penning cambridge in - it 's almost like they 've just swapped shirts .
leeds are doing exactly what cambridge did in the first half .
antonsson climbs well but nods it marginally wide for a goal kick .
author: Mark Johnson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

but with jansson suspended leaves them light in defence for next games

he gon na recall bellusci

documents.title: breakingleeds sub : cooper off , bartley on
text: mowatt rifles it low as he meets the ball over the top and it goes through the keeper 's legs , but drifts right along the far side to dallas , cooper getting it back in but not able to trouble cambridge .

documents.title: cambridge united 1-2 leeds
text: so jansson 's suspended , cooper 's injured - bartley 's coming on , so we wo n't see chris wood tonight .
cooper - ooft .
that does not look good at all .
he 's needing support from the physio and leeds are stretched now , resource-wise .

BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: cambridge united 1-2 leeds
text: legge heads it away with ease but cooper goes down again noel whelan reckons calf or ankle as the leeds man winces at the physio 's touch , pounding the floor in agony .

documents.title: cambridge united 1-2 leeds
text: cooper fouled by ikpeazu and both end up on the floor - cooper looking the worse off , mind .
referee lectures both and it 's a leeds free kick .

documents.title: breakingcambridge sub : newton off , dunk on
text: phillips is caught in possession and ikpeazu breaks , spreading it left to dunne but jansson doing well to clear .
that was just after the change - leeds ca n't switch off , though roofe looks dangerous on the right .
he hits a straight ball to antonsson but it 's too heavy .

documents.title: cambridge united 1-2 leeds
text: it 's all about the second half , for leeds - monk gets them in , explains what 's wrong , and they come out and change .
it 's been about attitude and aggression , and leeds ca n't have been shocked by what they saw from their opponents .

documents.title: breakinggoal : cambridge united 1-2 leeds united - mowatt
text: dallas chips the ball in and it goes up and out for a corner .

cambridge are looking a little hasty in the box now as leeds attack to their own fans - and the ball goes high to jansson , who directs it towards goal before mowatt races in to dink it in from close range .

documents.title: cambridge 1-1 leeds
text: leeds were n't positive enough , first half - the quality just was n't there .
they were making poor decisions and probably needed monk to speak to them .
coyle is raiding down the right now and is showing his strengths as a box-to-box wingback .
that 's what we need from him .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

you do wonder if cambridge will tire now - they 'll train hard , but leeds are up for this fight in a way they were n't in the first .

documents.title: breakinggoal : cambridge united 1-1 leeds united
text: enchanting leeds interchanging down the flank sees denton out mowatt , who dinks it to the far post dallas directs his header well and antonsson may have got a head on that - let 's see who claims it .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: leon legge and mark roberts are eating every ball that comes up to them - there 's been nothing to trouble them , and even the balls that have got up there have bobbled past them .
mowatt shoots from distance but it flies wide , though he did well to find the space and leeds are winning more fifty-fifties .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: decent ball to antonsson , but a heavy touch lets him down and he gifts a throw-in to cambridge .
story of leeds ' game , really .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: i 've not seen one diagonal switch from the centre halves today - and both cooper and jansson can do that .
but what we have had is passes going awry .
we can only assume berardi has taken a knock - out of everyone , he was the only one standing up to the fight .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leedsdoug shulman , bbc cambridge
text: this high-pressing game - cambridge are all over leeds , winning all the second balls .
clark loops the cross in and james dunne takes a delicate touch to nearly catch silvestri out , but cambridge have another corner .
the referee spots some shoving in the box and it 's a leeds free kick .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: leeds have a goal kick after ikpeazu just runs the ball out of play .
taylor knocks it out for a leeds throw in the cambridge half , but berry wins from jansson and cambridge spread to mingoia , whose shot deflects for a cambridge corner .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: denton slings in the cross as leeds start brightly .

max clark races forwards for the hosts but cooper does well to get leeds away , cambridge pack men into the box as the ball comes to doukara , but the referee blows as doukara seemingly falls on top of the ball .

documents.title: breakingkick-off : cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: leeds have made one change , coyle on for berardi .

documents.title: high pressing key for cambridgedoug shulman , bbc cambridge
text: we always say derry 's side are best when they get at people - and leeds have just been a bit ponderous .
derry prides leeds on their high line , their high pressing .
i do n't know if leeds are trying to slow the game down or not , but it 's been all cambridge in a fast-paced game as attacks have broken down .

documents.title: jansson yellow criticalcambridge 1-0 leeds
text: we needed jansson for the two massive games coming up - all in all , it 's just really unfortunate .
you ca n't manage a game not to win a yellow , as you 're not giving the team the confidence you need .
doukara 's been poor for me tonight - he just does n't seem at it .
leeds must have known cambridge will come out of the blocks - and doukara 's passing has been poor .
you ca n't play tippy-tappy football - you have to wear them out , then play .
antonsson has had nothing to work off .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half-time : cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: nervy stuff here , still - leeds frantically clear their lines and make it to half time without any further damage .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leedsdoug shulman , bbc cambridgeshire
text: as a manager or supporter , you want someone physical to hold the ball up and bring others into play - and ikpeazu is that man .
he 's been an absolute man mountain .

documents.title: breakingtwo added minutescambridge 1-0 leeds
text: breakingtwo added minutescambridge 1-0 leeds

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: ikpeazu has been very positive and jansson ca n't really dive in , being on that yellow .
he 's been a real thorn in leeds ' side .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: grimes belts it out for an attacking throw to cambridge , but doukara wins it and grimes gets doukara away as the visitors play themselves out of trouble .
they build steadily and quietly , but grimes ' ball to doukara leaves the leeds man a little short .
he tries the switch ball and berardi crosses , but there 's no one there , really .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: cooper 's header from the corner is cleared off the line following a stunning delivery from dallas - leeds have a second corner now , but the amber shirts belt it clear .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: mowatt shoots from 30 yards out and it dips teasingly , but norris is there to tip it over the bar .
more positive from leeds .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: the amber shirts gather quickly around leeds shirts as soon as the ball drops - there 's no let-up .
you 're just hoping they tire , as they 're giving leeds nowhere to go other than backwards .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: it 's just sloppy play .
denton has to be more positive for me - get down the byline , get into some one-on-ones and be more confident in his ability .
leeds have been too tippy-tappy at times , gone sideways and backwards when they should n't have .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: it almost makes its way to ikpeazu as cambridge launch it into the danger zone - but leeds live to fight another day as it comes to nothing .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: dallas delivers a ball to doukara but cambridge snatch it away , grimes ' snap shot proving equally easy to handle .
cambridge can attack so quickly - they get the ball to berry in the box and denton clears his lines , but taylor claws the ball back in and berry piles on the pressure to win a corner .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leedsdoug shulman , bbc cambridge
text: leeds are like rabbits in headlights , defensively - the corner falls to ikpeazu and then mingoia collects on the edge of the box .
there 's a sympathy free kick to leeds now as roberts and silvestri clash in the box .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: leeds launch it forwards but must go all the way back to cooper , mingoia and ikpeazu panicking leeds into putting the ball out for a throw .
cooper is caught in possession and the hosts break quickly , ikpeazu beating his man to win a corner .

documents.title: breakingyellow - berardi
text: ouch - late , late challenge by berardi on connor newton .
three booked in half an hour for leeds - looking rattled denton wins it but leeds are looking ragged .

documents.title: cambridge 1-0 leeds
text: cambridge are winning all the battles , and that 's the problem .
they 're closing down , stopping leeds from getting their heads up and are keeping hold of the ball better .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: breakinggoal : cambridge 1-0 leeds - ikpeazu
text: berry has a free kick on the edge of the penalty area and leeds do not deal with the deflection - ikpeazu escapes tyler denton and meets the rebound to fire it low past silvestri 's right .

documents.title: breakingyellow - jansson
text: agricultural challenge .
berry pulls the ball back and jansson is too heavy - he 's in the book and has his tenth yellow of the season , on track to miss the next two games .

documents.title: breakingyellow - phillipscambridge 0-0 leeds
text: ikpeazu goes down and it 's probably a bit of a harsh decision - cambridge fans complaining the referee did n't play advantage .
the free kick goes to legge but he ca n't win the header and leeds clear .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: mowatt has dallas to his right but finds grimes , who feeds dallas on the right wing .
he swings the ball in but there 's a deflection , and it bounces back twice before he rolls to grimes .
doukara has it , but cambridge clear it and taylor looks for the overlap before leeds attempt to win it back .
leeds are struggling in the moisture here - leeds look to go again but slack passing is halting offences as the pitch tears up .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: doukara is playing a very free role at the moment - popping up on the left , right , centrally .
there 's a shirt change for jansson but we 're back underway , jansson just waiting to come on but phillips having dropped into centre half in the meantime .
author: Mark Johnson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: norris tees it forward but jansson wrests ikpeazu away - and jansson is wringing his gloved hand looked like they just bumped into each other .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: doukara looks for a man on the overlap , but james dunne wins a free kick for the hosts after winning the ball from an unhappy doukara .
jansson deals with the danger but the referee blows for a push on leon legge from liam cooper .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: free kick to cambridge for a strong tackle on luke berry , halfway inside the leeds half .
luke berry 's range , this , as doukara joins a five-man wall .
berry whips it and silvestri scrambles across his line as it just dips wide .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: doukara knocks on to dallas , who slings a high ball to will norris .
the cambridge man takes it comfortably under no pressure .
leeds respond again , but antonsson 's pass to doukara breaks down as doukara moves too early .
berardi and grimes then must step in at the other end to avert the danger - this is mad stuff here .
mowatt sends the ball to antonsson from the hole but there 's just too much on the pass as antonsson fires over .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: cambridge are having a bit of joy down the flanks , and tyler denton steps in and gives them a throw-in in-line with the leeds penalty area .
the ball flies off berry for a leeds goal kick .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: berardi plays an inviting ball down the right flank to despatch mowatt , and leeds are moving at last .
they try to get the ball to doukara but cambridge belt it clear way beyond halfway , and the ball finds adams in leeds territory but leeds clear .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: this is n't the kind of pitch you can make mistakes on - it will cut up really easily .
leeds have to get into cambridge and stop them turning .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: ikpaeazu is the danger man again and berardi must come to the rescue this time - cambridge really have leeds on the rack here the hosts deliver another corner to the high post and it bumbles around in the box , no one able to clear , until mowatt gets away and manages to gain ground .
jansson wins a throw for leeds united to give us all a breather .

documents.title: cambridge 0-0 leeds
text: uche ikpeazu tries to hold the ball up , but berardi and mowatt suffocate them .
he gets it back , but , again , is stifled by leeds defending .

grimes takes a quick free kick as berardi is clipped by connor newton , but cambridge break with intent following grimes ' heavy touch and ikpeazu races unmarked in the box , shooting low at silvestri who parries away .
